messages.subject: Re.Religion and Home schooling
messages.msgSnippet: I am not religious. I do not belong to any church. I do believe in God. But my Homeschooling my daughter, has nothing at all to do with religion. Marianne
messages.messageBody:
I am not religious. I do not belong to any church. I do believe in
God.
But my Homeschooling my daughter, has nothing at all to do with
religion.
Marianne

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re.Religion and Home schooling
messages.msgSnippet: ... Marianne,  I feel the same way you do.  I am not religious but I know my Lord and that is all that matters!  thanks shelli
messages.messageBody:
